name: Disphere
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 34. Theme: Two Button Controls

Use only two buttons to control your fast moving craft around and abstract obstacle course of moving spikes. Collect prizes for points, and survive for as long as you can.

Use Z to move outwards from the center of the circles, and X to move inwards. Play for the highscore! Highscores are saved from play to play.

Download in windows for a high resolution experience.
